statements: SELECT * FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, temperature, heart_rate FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE blood_pressure < 120;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 23:59:59';
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate), MIN(blood_pressure) FROM patient_health_metrics GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, temperature, timestamp FROM patient_health_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate, AVG(blood_pressure) AS average_blood_pressure FROM patient_health_metrics;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_metrics;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient_health_metrics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE temperature > 98.6 AND activity_level = 'Moderate' ORDER BY recorded_time DESC;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM device_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING AVG(heart_rate) > 80;
SELECT p.patient_id, p.name, d.recorded_time, d.temperature FROM patient_health_metrics p JOIN device_data d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id WHERE d.temperature < 98.6 ORDER BY recorded_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM PatientData WHERE heart_rate > 80
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM DeviceData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT patient_id, device_id FROM PatientDevice
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE TIMESTAMP BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM PatientData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM PatientData WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND body_temp < 98.6
SELECT p.patient_id, d.device_id, dd.heart_rate FROM PatientData p JOIN PatientDevice pd ON p.patient_id = pd.patient_id JOIN DeviceData dd ON pd.device_id = dd.device_id
SELECT device_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM DeviceData GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(device_id) > 100
SELECT DISTINCT device_id, timestamp FROM DeviceData ORDER BY device_id, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT name, gender FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'flu'
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices
SELECT observation_type, value FROM observations WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT * FROM health_metrics ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT p.name, o.observation_type, o.value FROM patients p JOIN observations o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id WHERE o.observation_type='Blood Pressure' LIMIT 10;
SELECT h.metric_type, h.value, p.name FROM health_metrics h JOIN patients p ON h.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE h.value > 100 ORDER BY h.value DESC;
SELECT d.device_name, d.manufacturer, o.observation_type FROM devices d JOIN observations o ON d.device_id = o.patient_id WHERE d.device_type='Monitor' AND o.timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wearable_devices;
SELECT device_id, patient_id, device_type FROM wearable_devices;
SELECT patient_id, device_type FROM wearable_devices WHERE device_type='Fitbit';
SELECT device_id, date_started FROM wearable_devices ORDER BY date_started DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_studies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, birthdate FROM patients ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM wearable_devices GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM research_studies JOIN researchers ON research_studies.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id;

SELECT patient_name, metric_name, value, timestamp FROM patients JOIN wearable_devices ON patients.patient_id = wearable_devices.patient_id JOIN patient_health_metrics ON wearable_devices.device_id = patient_health_metrics.device_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
